mapper.update: update IPO_SPECIALCOUNTERFEE set FIRMID = #{firmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMODITYID = #{commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADEALGR = #{tradealgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BUY = #{buy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SELL = #{sell,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATEDATE = #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTERFEETYPE = #{counterfeetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(0) from (select t.*,rownum TNO from IPO_SPECIALCOUNTERFEE t where 1=1 order by t.ID)
select count(0) from m_firm where firmid=#{firmid}
